unnormalised: Okay, here's a Quora post draft:
normalised: Okay, here's the normalized version of your Quora post draft:

unnormalised: **Are Exam Prep Apps Actually Helpful? (Education Technology)**
normalised: **Are Exam Prep Apps Actually Helpful? (Education Technology)**

unnormalised: Okay, so I'm prepping for my NEET exam AGAIN (sigh!) and was wondering what everyone thinks about these exam prep apps that are popping up everywhere. Are they actually useful or just another distraction?
normalised: Okay, so I'm prepping for my N E E T exam again (sigh!) and was wondering what everyone thinks about these exam prep apps that are popping up everywhere. Are they actually useful or just another distraction?

unnormalised: I've tried a few – like the one my friend Priya swears by, saying she aced her JEE mains with it. It has like, tons of practice questions and mock tests. I even saw one promising "success strategies" based on your performance, like some sort of modern-day Panditji predicting your score! My problem is discipline. I get distracted easily, especially when I'm supposed to be studying at 09:00 hrs on a Sunday.
normalised: I've tried a few – like the one my friend Priya swears by, saying she aced her J E E mains with it. It has like, tons of practice questions and mock tests. I even saw one promising "success strategies" based on your performance, like some sort of modern-day Panditji predicting your score! My problem is discipline. I get distracted easily, especially when I'm supposed to be studying at nine o'clock on a Sunday.

unnormalised: Anyone else using these apps for competitive exams like UPSC or CAT? Does the personalized feedback actually help? Or am I better off sticking to my old NCERT books and coaching class notes from Vidyalankar?
normalised: Anyone else using these apps for competitive exams like U P S C or C A T? Does the personalized feedback actually help? Or am I better off sticking to my old N C E R T books and coaching class notes from Vidyalankar?

unnormalised: I'm worried they’re just a way to sell study material repackaged for your phone. What's the real deal? Share your experiences! Did an app help you crack your exam? What features are must-haves? Asking for a friend (who needs to pass this NEET exam on 05/05/2024!). Also, any recommendations for apps for learning Sanskrit? My grandma keeps saying "vidya is in Sanskrit!". I need to brush up before 15/08/2024, Independence Day! Help a brother out. Rs. 50 reward for the best tip.
